ComicInfo.Title: The Worstest Day I Ever Had; Heady Kraze and Fuzz Reamer; 11 Baseball Mascots That Didn't Work Out; Full of It House; The Hunter; The Animal Rights Debate; Cracked Movie Awards; What If Comic Strips Featured Guest Stars?; Interpreting Cave Drawings; Celebrity Robots; New Dance Steps for Urban Street Survival; The Beaver; The License Exam; The Finkstones
ComicInfo.Summary: The Peanuts with guest star Curtis, Rex Morgan with guest star Little Orphan Annie, Dick Tracy with guest star Broom Hilda, the Amazing Spider-Man with guest star Mary Worth and Doonesbury with guest star Garfield.
